captions.text: Will you smile only to me
Every day when I walk past your house
I want to be brave now
Falling in love, I'm in to you
Hands up, you have me surrendered
I like it when you smile
Just maybe think about if you are not my lady
No way, you're more valuable than anything
I can't leave you, so by my side, just stay
I can feel about you even when time passes
Every day if I'm with you by your side
I'll carve my love only for you
Baby don't walk away from me
Just stay there, I'll come to you
And I know is harder to see
The deeper the love, the harder it is
Let us stay how we are
Lean on each other, not drift away
Just right hold me up all night
And we'll never gonna slow down that's right
